name: Test - Has Field Value Changed?
description: When there is a trigger event, do action

block.name: call_service
block.description: Call recipe Callable - Field Monitoring - Remove Field Value from Monitoring

dynamicPickListSelection.flow_id: Callable - Field Monitoring - Remove Field Value from Monitoring

flow_id.name: Callable - Field Monitoring - Remove Field Value from Monitoring

properties.label: Field Previously Monitored?

toggle_field.label: Field Being Monitored?
toggle_field.name: was_field_being_monitored
toggle_field.hint: Indicates whether the field was present in the field_monitoring database

properties.name: was_field_previously_monitored
properties.hint: Indicates whether the field was present in the field_monitoring database

properties.label: Field Upserted to Database for future change checks?

toggle_field.label: Field Removed from Database?
toggle_field.name: was_field_removed_from_monitoring_database
toggle_field.hint: Indicates whether the specified was upserted into the monitoring database for future change checks.

properties.name: was_field_removed_from_monitoring_database
properties.hint: Indicates whether the specified was removed from the monitoring database.

properties.label: System Name
properties.name: system_name
properties.hint: Name of the System (i.e. salesforce, netsuite, workday, etc

properties.label: Object ID
properties.name: object_id
properties.hint: Unique Identifier of the object within the system that is being monitoried (i.e. for Salesforce, this would be the Record Id of the object)

properties.label: Field Name
properties.name: field_name
properties.hint: Name of the Field (i.e. if monitoring the Account name in Salesforce, the field name would be 'name')

properties.label: Field Definition
properties.name: field_definition
properties.hint: The system_name, object_id, and field_name will be used as primary keys to uniquely identify the value being monitored.

block.name: call_service
block.description: Call recipe Callable - Field Monitoring - Has Field Value Been Changed?

dynamicPickListSelection.flow_id: Callable - Field Monitoring - Has Field Value Been Changed?

flow_id.name: Callable - Field Monitoring - Has Field Value Been Changed?

properties.label: Field Previously Monitored?

toggle_field.label: Field Previously Monitored?
toggle_field.name: was_field_being_monitored
toggle_field.hint: Indicates whether the field was present in the field_monitoring database

properties.name: was_field_being_monitored
properties.hint: Indicates whether the field was present in the field_monitoring database

properties.label: Field Upserted to Database for future change checks?

toggle_field.label: Field Upserted to Database for future change checks?
toggle_field.name: was_field_upserted_to_monitoring_database
toggle_field.hint: Indicates whether the specified was upserted into the monitoring database for future change checks.

properties.name: was_field_upserted_to_monitoring_database
properties.hint: Indicates whether the specified was upserted into the monitoring database for future change checks.

properties.label: Field Changed?

toggle_field.label: Field Changed?
toggle_field.name: has_field_changed
toggle_field.hint: Did this value change?

properties.name: has_field_changed
properties.hint: Did this value change?

properties.label: Field Last Updated
properties.name: field_last_updated
properties.hint: This is the date the field was last updated (regardless if the field has changed or not).

properties.label: System Name
properties.name: system_name
properties.hint: Name of the System (i.e. salesforce, netsuite, workday, etc

properties.label: Object ID
properties.name: object_id
properties.hint: Unique Identifier of the object within the system that is being monitoried (i.e. for Salesforce, this would be the Record Id of the object)

properties.label: Object Name
properties.name: object_name
properties.hint: Name of the Object (not required, just used for storing more information about the object being monitored)

properties.label: Field Name
properties.name: field_name
properties.hint: Name of the Field (i.e. if monitoring the Account name in Salesforce, the field name would be 'name')

properties.label: Value
properties.name: value
properties.hint: Value of the field being monitored.  This value will be compared in the future to determine if the field has changed.

properties.label: Field Definition
properties.name: field_definition
properties.hint: The system_name, object_id, and field_name will be used as primary keys to uniquely identify the value being monitored.

properties.label: Option - Update Value if Changed?

toggle_field.label: Option - Update Value if Changed?
toggle_field.name: option_update_value_if_changed
toggle_field.hint: When checking to see if the value has changed, selecting 'TRUE' will update the monitored value for future tracking (future checks will use the value specified in the field_definition)

properties.name: option_update_value_if_changed
properties.hint: When checking to see if the value has changed, selecting 'TRUE' will update the monitored value for future tracking (future checks will use the value specified in the field_definition)
